title: BEST TWISTED FATE SKIN [POLL]
body:
What do you guys think is the best (CURRENTLY PURCHASABLE) Twisted Fate skin??? 
Please vote in the poll below as well as comment why :D

{{{EDIT}}} Sorry guys for not including all the skins! Please let me explain my logic. I didn't include skins that are not purchasable currently and classic because this board was created to help me (and others) find the best TF skin and I will probably purchase the one with the most votes.

replies.body: i vote underworld but thats not  on there
hey! I'm hoping to get a TF skin soon but underworld is currently unavailable, so I did the skins that are purchasable currently. :D
What about pax tf and underworld TF?
hey! I'm hoping to get a TF skin soon but underworld and pax are currently unavailable, so I did the skins that are purchasable currently. :D

?? you didn't even include all of them.. lul
PAX TF
THE MAGNIFICENT TF.. 
MAGICIAN TF(LEGACY S3)
underworld tf
^__^
hey! I'm hoping to get a TF skin soon but the ones you mentioned currently unavailable, so I did the skins that are purchasable currently. :D
sry! I didn't include classic bc I'm trying to choose which skin to buy!
umm underworld or magnificent are the best ones no ?s asked
magnificent is probably the worst one actually  lol
Yeah i think that too but sadly they are currently unavailable ;d
